title: Deadly Chapel
description: She just got an invite to a wedding. Unfortunately, it is from her ex. When Doris Cudlow attends her ex-husband's wedding, she's pretty sure it is a mistake. Boy, is she right. But it isn't until the bride disappears and her ex is on the run from the police that things really go downhill. Doris teams up with her nosy landlady, and the duo turn detective to solve the mystery. As Doris digs, she uncovers a web of lies along with a deadly secret.
